entry.title: Thursday: Light snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Light snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 22 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Light snow. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late this evening then clear. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 24 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Thursday 6 April 2023
